org.vadere.simulator.projects

Class ScenarioRunLocked

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vadere.simulator.projects.ScenarioRunManager
      • org.vadere.simulator.projects.ScenarioRunLocked
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ScenarioRunLocked
extends ScenarioRunManager
    Can be used to start Vadere in [lock] mode. It will search for a lock file and starts running after it is removed.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Run method. Initializes run by calling ScenarioRunManager.doBeforeSimulation(). Calls lock handling routine handleLock(Path).
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
